title: California type (sans Emigre)
content:
Can anyone name some type foundries and type designers in [California](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011052859/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/California) other than [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011052859/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Emigre)?

thnx!

 [‹ Romance novel fonts search](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011052859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27449 "Go to previous forum topic") [Any ideas of great, award winning logo websites? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011052859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27410 "Go to next forum topic")
author: belonax

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=california](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011052859/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=california "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=california")

I can’t, maybe you can pick the bones out of this.  
Tim

Of course there’s also Hrant  
 [http://www.themicrofoundry.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011052859/http:/www.themicrofoundry.com/ "http://www.themicrofoundry.com/")
